mapper.select: SELECT id, label, parent_id, creator, create_time, update_time, comment FROM ieltsnote.word_tag WHERE creator = #{wordTagDO.creator} order by create_time asc
SELECT count(label) FROM ieltsnote.word_tag WHERE label = #{wordTagDO.label} and creator = #{wordTagDO.creator}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ieltsnote.word_tag(label, parent_id, creator, create_time, comment) VALUES (#{label}, #{parent_id}, #{creator}, NOW(), #{comment})
mapper.update: update ieltsnote.word_tag set label = #{wordTagDO.label}, comment = #{wordTagDO.comment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{wordTagDO.id}
